Roadmap ‚Äã

What's planned for Minepanel.

Recently Completed ‚Äã

‚úÖ CurseForge browser ‚Äã

  • Search modpacks
  • Filter by version/loader
  • One-click install
  • Auto updates

‚úÖ Fabric Support ‚Äã

  • Full Fabric server type support
  • Loader and launcher version configuration
  • Compatible with mod management features

‚úÖ Modrinth Integration ‚Äã

  • Auto-download mods from Modrinth
  • Support for Fabric, Forge, and modded servers
  • Dependency resolution (required/optional)
  • Multiple project reference formats

‚úÖ CurseForge Files ‚Äã

  • Individual mod downloads from CurseForge
  • Works alongside Modrinth
  • Multiple reference formats
  • Auto-version selection

Coming soon ‚Äã

Better log viewer ‚Äã

  • Search and filtering
  • Export logs
  • Error highlighting
  • Stats

server.properties editor ‚Äã

  • Edit from UI
  • Validation
  • Tooltips for each setting
  • Backup before save

Reverse proxy helper ‚Äã

  • NGINX/Caddy config
  • SSL with Let's Encrypt
  • Custom domains
  • No exposed ports

Planned ‚Äã

User roles ‚Äã

  • Multiple users
  • Custom permissions
  • Per-server access
  • Audit logs

Server templates ‚Äã

  • Pre-configured setups
  • One-click deploy
  • Share configs

Better metrics ‚Äã

  • Graphs and charts
  • Historical data
  • Performance insights
  • Alerts

Discord webhooks ‚Äã

  • Server start/stop notifications
  • Error alerts
  • Player join/leave
  • Custom events

Plugin manager ‚Äã

  • Browse plugins
  • Install from UI
  • Update plugins
  • Dependency handling

World manager ‚Äã

  • Upload worlds
  • Download backups
  • Switch worlds
  • Multiple world slots

Scheduled tasks ‚Äã

  • Auto restarts
  • Scheduled backups
  • Maintenance windows
  • Command scheduling

Maybe ‚Äã

Multi-server commands ‚Äã

Run commands on multiple servers at once

Resource limits UI ‚Äã

Configure CPU/RAM limits from UI

RCON improvements ‚Äã

Better console with autocomplete

Server comparison ‚Äã

Compare performance between servers

Config import/export ‚Äã

Backup and restore configs

Mobile app ‚Äã

Native iOS/Android app

How to contribute ‚Äã

Want to help build these features? Check CONTRIBUTING.md

Ideas? Open an issue or discussion on GitHub.

Priority changes ‚Äã

Priorities might change based on:

  • Community feedback
  • Technical constraints
  • Available time
  • Dependencies

Stay updated ‚Äã

  • Watch the GitHub repo
  • Check releases
  • Follow updates on Docker Hub
